phrs.translation: 松动, 松开, 松度, 解除
思维散漫, 思维松弛, 又称松散
结构松散, 构造松弛
土壤松散, 土壤松散度
公隙值, 松动量, 松弛量, 间隙量

sentences.sentence: Many authors prefer the term "association" to the term "community" in order to stress the looseness of the interaction.
sentences.translation: 许多作者更喜欢用“协会”而不是“社区”这个词来强调这种相互作用的松散性。

sentences.sentence: If looseness or instability of base plate were found, they should be reinforced to avoid accidents.
sentences.translation: 如发现有松动或底盘固定不稳，应及时加固，以避免事故发生。

sentences.sentence: These complicated motion features of the system can be used to diagnose the fault of pedestal looseness.
sentences.translation: 系统的这些复杂运动特征可望用来诊断这一故障。
